<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77204</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77204</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a67bd5d1-b4d2-4eae-b19d-b50b977fefe8#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Krinolinos nő</string>
            <string language="en">Chrinoline woman</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chrinoline Frau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femme de Chrinoline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulher de Chrinoline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donna di Chrinoline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκα Chrinoline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujer de Chrinoline</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Öltöztetőbaba felöltöztetése a 19. század első felének divatja szerint</string>
            <string language="en">They are clothed the manikins in the fashion of the first half of the 19. century</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">nők,  divat,  </string>
            <string language="en">women, fashion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihnen werden die Männchen in der Art und Weise 
der ersten Hälfte des Jahrhunderts 19. gekleidet</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Elles sont vêtues les mannequins de la mode de la
première moitié du siècle 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">São vestidos os manikins na forma da primeira 
metade do século 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sono coperti i manichini al modo della prima metà
del secolo 19.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι ντυμένοι τα ανδρείκελα στη μόδα του πρώτου 
μισού του αιώνα 19,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Se arropan los maniquíes en la manera de la 
primera mitad del siglo 19.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen, Art und Weise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">femmes, mode</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mulheres, forma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">donne, modo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γυναίκες, μόδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mujeres, manera</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77204</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
